properties.title: 2024 Lake Chad Basin Floods
properties.caption: Lake Chad: a transboundary inland lake whose receding shoreline and floodplains illustrate how changing rainfall and water management shape flood risk.For example, the July 2024 floods resulted in more than 621 dead, and 1.2 million displaced.
